statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports;
SELECT report_id, farm_id, report_date FROM water_usage_reports WHERE water_usage_gallons > 1000;
SELECT report_id, farm_id, report_date, compliance_status FROM water_usage_reports WHERE farm_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT farm_id, SUM(water_usage_gallons) AS total_usage FROM water_usage_reports GROUP BY farm_id;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, water_usage_gallons ASC
SELECT farm_id, water_usage_gallons FROM water_usage_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant'
SELECT AVG(water_usage_gallons) AS avg_water_usage FROM water_usage_reports
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT farm_id, SUM(water_usage_gallons) AS total_water_usage FROM water_usage_reports GROUP BY farm_id HAVING total_water_usage > 10000
SELECT report_id, report_date, farm_id, water_usage FROM water_usage_reports;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location, acreage FROM farm_details;
SELECT farm_name, location, acreage, farm_id FROM farm_details;
SELECT water_usage, report_date, farm_id, report_id FROM water_usage_reports;
SELECT report_date, water_usage, farm_id, report_id FROM water_usage_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, farm_id, water_usage FROM water_usage_reports WHERE farm_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_reports WHERE water_usage > 100 AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC;

SELECT farm_name, location, acreage, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM farm_details INNER JOIN water_usage_reports ON farm_details.farm_id = water_usage_reports.farm_id GROUP BY farm_name, location, acreage;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location, water_usage FROM farm_details LEFT JOIN water_usage_reports ON farm_details.farm_id = water_usage_reports.farm_id WHERE water_usage IS NULL;
SELECT report_id, report_date, farm_id, water_usage FROM water_usage_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY water_usage DESC, report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT id, source_name, location FROM water_sources ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT source_name, capacity FROM water_sources WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT activity_name, start_date, end_date FROM farming_activities WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT wu.amount_used, ws.source_name FROM water_usage wu JOIN water_sources ws ON wu.water_source_id = ws.id WHERE farming_activity_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM water_sources;
SELECT id, source_name, capacity FROM water_sources WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM water_sources WHERE location LIKE '%New%' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT w.source_name, f.activity_name, u.amount_used FROM water_sources w LEFT JOIN water_usage u ON w.id = u.water_source_id INNER JOIN farming_activities f ON u.farming_activity_id = f.id;

SELECT f.activity_name, w.location, u.amount_used FROM farming_activities f JOIN water_usage u ON f.id = u.farming_activity_id LEFT JOIN water_sources w ON u.water_source_id = w.id ORDER BY f.start_date DESC, u.amount_used ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT source_name, location FROM WaterSources WHERE water_type = 'groundwater';
SELECT * FROM Farms WHERE size_acres > 50;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM Farms ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT report_id, farm_id, total_usage_gallons FROM Reports WHERE total_usage_gallons > 10000;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources WHERE water_type = 'groundwater' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM WaterSources WHERE id = 3;
SELECT farm_name, size_acres FROM Farms WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY size_acres ASC;
SELECT farm_name, location, amount_gallons FROM Farms JOIN WaterUsage ON Farms.farm_id = WaterUsage.farm_id WHERE amount_gallons > 5000 ORDER BY location, amount_gallons DESC;
SELECT farm_name, report_date, total_usage_gallons FROM Farms JOIN Reports ON Farms.farm_id = Reports.farm_id WHERE total_usage_gallons > 10000 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WaterSources;
SELECT id, source_name, location FROM WaterSources ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT source_name FROM WaterSources WHERE source_type = 'river';
SELECT id, amount FROM WaterUsage WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FarmingActivities WHERE location LIKE '%valley%'
SELECT * FROM WaterSources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_name, location FROM WaterSources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type, location FROM WaterSources WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT source_name, source_type, location FROM WaterSources WHERE source_type = 'River' AND location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT a.activity_name, ar.date, ar.report_text FROM FarmingActivities a JOIN ActivityReport ar ON a.id = ar.activity_id WHERE ar.date > '2022-01-01';
